title: Lag with low ping, unable to leave at the end of the game
body:
I've been experiencing a sort of lag, even with low ping and high fps, and running a full repair + uninstalling/reinstalling the game didn't work.

The lag shows up in the most important parts of the game, tough team fights or kill shots.

When I win a game the "victory" sign doesn't appear and I'm unable to quit without forcing the game to quit.

All this started when I updated windows a bit less than a week ago.

Any ideas on how to fix it?

replies.body: Ahhhhh I may have a quick fix for all of this. Nowadays when Windows updates, it can force the Xbox Game DVR to turn back on. Double check that it's turned off and test it in a custom game to see if that helps. If not hit me back up and we can troubleshoot more!
Update : to quit at the end of the game I have to go through the same procedure as when you go afk in the middle of a game. If I quit fast enough the rest is like normal (honor process then stats)
